text:
The two following questions don't have their related answer in the log4j FAQ:


* What is the use of the debug method expecting a String array as one of
  his parameters?
* Why was the Logger class introduced and how do I migrate from the
  previous String based implementation?

Nicolas Girard <Nicolas.Girard@IReS.in2p3.fr>
creator: ceki@apache.org
yoavs@computer.org
text:
Both questions are no longer relevant.  There's no Logger#debug method with a 
String[] argument, and the Logger class is now several years old, not new to 
anyone.
